name: CTParagraphStyleSetting
desc: This structure is used to alter the paragraph style.

items.name: init(spec: CTParagraphStyleSpecifier, valueSize: Int, value: UnsafeRawPointer)
var spec: CTParagraphStyleSpecifier
items.desc: The specifier of the setting. See CTParagraphStyleSpecifier for possible values.

items.name: var value: UnsafeRawPointer
items.desc: A reference to the value of the setting specified by the spec field. The value must be in the proper range for the spec value and at least as large as the size specified in valueSize.

items.name: var valueSize: Int
items.desc: The size of the value pointed to by the value field. This value must match the size of the value required by the CTParagraphStyleSpecifier set in the spec field.
